title: Gluten-free bread
ingredients: ['1 egg', '80ml egg whites', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '60ml rapeseed oil', '60ml honey', '350ml warm skimmed milk', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon xanthan gum', '70g tapioca flour', '4 tablespoons chickpea flour', '4 tablespoons millet flour', '160g white rice flour', '160g brown rice flour', '10g dried active baking yeast']
